title: Can my girl friend make a bot to test in a LoL account for fun? Do you IP ban?
body:
So my girlfriend wants to make a bot to test out in lol because bot making is fun for her. 
Is this aloud if she has no alternator motives? 
She would be wanting to test it in ranked.
If this is not allowed can you release an area in which you can do this for fun? 

Does roit games Ip ban?

replies.body: Bots almost always take the fun out of matches, on top of the fact that a bot controlling an account is actually a reportable offense. I'd probably try to steer her clear of botting.
